sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 45 centimeters. What is the length of each of its sides?
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three equal sides. To find the length of each side, divide the total perimeter by the number of sides:

45 cm (perimeter) รท 3 (sides) = 15 cm

Each side of the equilateral triangle is 15 centimeters long.
